HEADING: Migrate Comments
INTRO_DESCRIPTION: This tool allows you to batch migrate your comments across different URLs or sites.
URL_INFO: You can enter part of a URL, like a domain, or a full URL, or a URL ID.
DOMAIN_FROM_LABEL: What URL or domain are you migrating from?
DOMAIN_TO_LABEL: What URL or domain are you migrating to?
EMAIL_NOTIFICATION_INFO: You'll receive an email notifying you when it's complete.
NOSCRIPT_REFRESH_MESSAGE: Refresh the page to get the latest status.
NO_MIGRATIONS_MESSAGE: You don't have any pending or past domain migrations.
